m_szDocTitle: Putting aside diesels, Audi unveils hydrogen concept car
m_szDocSumamry: FacebookEmail Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Putting aside diesels, Audi unveils hydrogen concept car DETROIT -- Snared in Volkswagen Group's diesel scandal, Audi sought to direct attention to the future -- way, way out in the future -- in unveiling a hydrogen-powered concept at the North American International Auto Show here.
